entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
